name: com.pavel_sushkov.curved_linerenderer_utility
description:
Simple tool for making array of Vector3 dots, which can be in form of bezier curves, spirals, springs, cones.
On top of that you can add adjustable noise.
"Line" (or even "path" if you want to use the array of Vector3 that way) can be "cutted" with obstacles and auto updated with optional frequency.
Main tool - CurvesUtility. Drop it to GameObject, add LineRenderer if needed and set up parameters.
